headline: Packaging Corporation of America Schedules Conference Call to Discuss Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2024 Operating Results
summary: LAKE FOREST, Ill., December 12, 2024--Packaging Corporation of America (NYSE: PKG) will hold a conference call on Wednesday, January 29, 2025 at 9:00 a.m. Eastern Time to discuss fourth quarter and full year 2024 results. The conference call leader will be Mark Kowlzan. Fourth quarter and full year earnings results will be released after the market closes on Tuesday, January 28, 2025.
